content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained" )
( ing-1 "1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained" )
( ing-2 "3 1/2 cups frozen whipped topping, thawed" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, combine the oranges, pineapple, whipped topping, coconut, marshmallows and milk.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the oranges"@28:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "pineapple"@41:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "whipped topping"@52:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "coconut"@69:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "marshmallows"@78:90 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "milk"@95:99 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Mix together well and chill 1 hour before serving.
